description: Three biweekly quizzes (Weeks 3, 5, 8) with multiple-choice and short-answer questions testing lecture/practical material. Each quiz is 20 minutes long and worth 10% of the total grade.
Individual critical review (750 words) correcting an AI-generated draft on a contemporary genetics topic. Requires justification of modifications with references. Due in Week 9.
Two-hour exam during formal examination period with multiple-choice and short-answer questions assessing lecture/practical content. Covers all course material.
